tika.dc.description: "ADHD is not an excuse; however, it is a reason..." he says, using his personal familiarity to humanize what has become a scientific phenomenon affecting millions of children and adults globally. Within the pages of this book, Bryan explains what The Brilliant Reality is, and how each of us can appreciate its value in our lives. The power of positive thinking and positive redirection are central to Bryan's message. Bryan's ambition is to bring inspiration, motivation and ultimately, hope, to everyone whose lives have been touched by ADHD.
